mapper.select: select mc as name from khkview where bmmc = '成教营销中心' and tybz = '0'
select jc as name from TsflkView where jc not like '%采购%' and sjdm <> '||'
select distinct shum as name from fxsgkview where sxh not like '%W%'
select REPLACE(mc,'-CJ1', '') name from xsflk where sjdm = '01'
select jc as name from khdqk

select rkdbh,txrq,sxh,cs,gysmc from (select rkdbh,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq, sxh,cs,gysmc from RkmxView union select rkdbh,CONVERT(varchar(100), txrq, 23) txrq, sxh,cs,gysmc from RkmxnView) rkmxjl order by txrq
select sxh,sum(qmkc) qmkc from kucunView where kwbh = '00HG' group by sxh,shum,bmmc
